original_text: Some people promise things, but they never do anything. Those people are like clouds and wind that do not bring any rain.
korean_text: 선물한다고 거짓 자랑하는 자는 비 없는 구름과 바람 같으니라

sentences.original_text: Those people are like clouds and wind
that do not bring any rain
sentences.korean_translation: 비를 내리지 않는 구름과 바람과 같습니다
